homePageText.title: Logic Apps Diagnostics
homePageText.description: Investigate how your app is performing, diagnose issues, and discover how to improve its reliability.

categories.name: Diagnostics
categories.description: Get an overview about the most recent runs and their steps, troubleshoot, and identify possible improvements.

categories.name: Connector Actions Health
categories.description: Review connector actions health to get the details on connector errors, timeouts, or any other unexpected behavior.
